short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that automatically messages all of your ProductHunt followers on Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launching Buddy is a Chrome Extension designed to cycle through all the followers of your Product Hunt user account and send them messages via Twitter DMs. The purpose of this extension is to inform all your Product Hunt followers about your latest product launch.
